sentences.en: Father Whittaker appeared to be in a jovial mood.
sentences.cn: 惠特克神父看起来心情非常好。
祖母身材圆胖，整天乐呵呵的。

sentences.en: He addressed me in a jovial manner.
He seemed jovial, but his eyes avoided ours.
sentences.cn: 他显得很高兴, 但他的眼光却避开了我们的眼光. ”
他带着轻松而居高临下的神气微微一笑.

sentences.en: He was falsely jovial, with his booming, mirthless laugh.
sentences.cn: 他低声苦笑了几声，装出快乐的样子。

sentences.en: He was not met by the smiles and jovial greetings of his cronies.
sentences.cn: 餐室里原也有七八个人,可都是陌生面孔.

sentences.en: Jovial ladies chivvy you into ordering more than you can eat!
sentences.cn: 热情的女招待会一再推荐，最后点的餐多到吃不下!

sentences.en: Michael was in a jovial and optimistic mood.
Mike's jovial face seemed to sag.
sentences.cn: 迈克那张高兴的脸似乎一沉.

sentences.en: Richard Brome, an acolyte of Ben Jonson's, wrote "The Jovial Crew" in 1641.
sentences.cn: 本·琼森的仆人理查德·布罗姆在1641年写了《一伙快活人》。

sentences.en: They were both of them jovial about the cold in winter and the heat in summer.
sentences.cn: 他们两人都对冬季的寒冷、夏季的炎热感到痛快.

sentences.en: Today Sarah became jovial and expansive.
sentences.cn: 今天萨拉变得快活而健谈.

sentences.en: Tom's jovial manner is one of his characters.
sentences.cn: 汤姆快活的态度是他的个性之一.

sentences.en: When we next met, he was much more jovial.
sentences.cn: 我们再次见面时，他愉快多了。

trans.tran_cn: 快乐的，好交际的，善良快活的
